Reviews.Title: Reasonable item for the money
Reviews.Author: N. Stoddart "Drew Andrews"
Reviews.Content: Priced below comparable items. Separate power supply made it difficult to mount it flat on the wall. Bought for the kithen.Picture quality is very nice. Quick shipping. Does lose it's channels at times need to leave it on about 5 minutes to rescan channels.I would buy another should I need one that small.

Reviews.Title: Great for college students and small rooms
Reviews.Author: Ernest M. Arnold
Reviews.Content: I bought this a year ago for my dorm off of some extra summer wages, and it worked wonderfully on top of my desk while barely taking up any space.  The image quality is very nice (not HD, but nice).  I go to school and live on opposite coasts, so storage is an issue, the slim size, once again, is clutch, and it looks good.  I have it in storage and can't wait to get it back in the fall. 15 inches is enough to enjoy movies or TV casually, especially on the desk for a quick study break.I've seen complaints about the sound, its certainly not Bose but it is on par with other tvs of similar size, and will do for casual use. It has a headphone jack, so if you have good computer speakers (particularly if it has a subwoofer), you can plug in easily for when you want better sound for a movie or sports and switch right back over.  Has all the inputs you need for dvd, games, cable, sound, and even a vga input to double as a monitor if you wanted.Overall, if you need a TV for a small room, this is great for a desktop situation.Worth the extra 50 or 60 bucks to save space.Whether your a student buying your own or a parent buying for your son or daughter: this is an affordable solution.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound quality negates otherwise fine lcd tv
Reviews.Author: Achiever
Reviews.Content: I purchased this on impulse without researching brands when I was shopping for a small tv. The sleek design appealed to me and thought it would be handy to have the option of a second computer monitor. However since I'm using it primarily as a tv, the tin sounding speakers ruin it for me. A very poor performer unless it will be used purely as a monitor.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound hard to adjust
Reviews.Author: Robert F. Leroux "Handmade-Buy"
Reviews.Content: Out of the box months ago and still can't get it adjusted.  From 12 feet away the sound is tinny and acceptable only if the bass is turned way up and the treble is turned way down.  The picture is not crisp and the background is too black.  If I adjust it brighter everything turns washed out.  I expected more.  I use it with ear phones and over a treadmill so it is acceptable for the price.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PICTURE, POOR SOUND, GREAT FOR PLAYING VIDEO GAMES
Reviews.Author: GAVELFALL
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv to play video games on. I am very happy with the picture quality, however the sound is poor. I would not buy this if you want it for a primary tv, but it is nice for what i want it for. I have it placed next to a Sony LCD 42" that i use to watch tv on. If you decide to buy this tv, check Walmart. I paid $199.00 + $17.00 for a 2 year extended warranty. The only drawback to this tv is that the picture is very small for us "over 40" crowd.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Television
Reviews.Author: Sheila Marie Grandberry Sawyer "sheilasawr"
Reviews.Content: the t.v. is a nice little television and it is loaded with features.  I purchased it for my daughter after lightnening took out her 20 inch and she is happy with it.  thank you.

Reviews.Title: good size  poor sound quality
Reviews.Author: Robert F. Leroux "Handmade-Buy"
Reviews.Content: Installed this with a wall bracket (must be purchased separately) to hang on the wall in front of my treadmill.  The picture is very good but the DC motor of the treadmill sends minimally bothersome interference across the screen.  The sound is very tinny and true to other reviews gets worse when the volume is increased.  Since I plan to use the earphone jack and the price of the set is reasonable, I can live with it.  However if sound is important, plan on using the earphones or buy something else.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Product
Reviews.Author: Zartog the Magnificent
Reviews.Content: I bought this product a year ago, and a few months after I bought it I would have intermittent problems with the TV video - it would flash to a garbled screen with vertical and horizontal patchwork lines.  I never sent it back because every time I was about to the problem would go away.  Now the problem seems to be permanent.  The problem only happens with TV and S-video, not the computer VGA input.Also, changing channels is annoying because there's a 2 second pause between channels.  Very annoying.Don't bother with Magnavox.  I've never had a reliable product from either Philips or Magnavox.

Reviews.Title: Magnavox 15MF400 15" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Frances M. Catlin "Frannie"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this small TV.. I have two of them.. one in the Kitchen and one in the Bedroom.They have a wonderful picture and sound, and take only minimal space.A VERY good purchase

Reviews.Title: Magnavox 15" Lcd  flat panel TV
Reviews.Author: Casey
Reviews.Content: The flat panel tv is a great tv to purchase.. The color is great, the speakers they used are great sounding too.  Easy set up with easy to follow instructions.  I would recommend this product to anyone who is in the market for a 15" flat panel lcd tv.  A great tv for the money.  There are many manufacturers to look at, but Magnavox has been around for years and they continue to build quality products.

Reviews.Title: Avoid this POS at all costs mediocre in all respects
Reviews.Author: lostjohn "lostjohn"
Reviews.Content: I can't find anyhting to like about this TV other than multiple inputs, everything about its performance is mediocre.

Reviews.Title: Great small T.V. for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Kemper
Reviews.Content: I bought this T.V. about 6 months ago and I am very pleased with it. It is small but fits perfectly into a cabinet that I have in my bedroom. The picture and sound are clear and I haven't had any problems with it. I also like the fact that I can hook my laptop to it and use it as a computer monitor. Works Great!

Reviews.Title: Defective but replaced quickly
Reviews.Author: A. Hayward
Reviews.Content: The TV broke a few days after receiving it.  They sent me a new one at no charge and paid for the return of the broken TV.  Only problem is that their warrantee on the TV would not start on the date I received the replacement TV.  My warrantee on the replacement TV would start on the day I received the defective TV.  Not very fair.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: SK
Reviews.Content: I have owned this for over a year and when my laptop was stolen I connected it to a PC and it works fine. It's SAP function works and the sound was ok. I also have it conected to my local cable company so it does both functions. TV and PC monitor.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Value
Reviews.Author: Jesda Gulati
Reviews.Content: I wanted to connect my Playstation and my Mac to one display, and this turned out perfectly. There's inputs for component, VGA, RF antenna, and S-video. Documentation is lacking but not really necessary. It also has picture-in-picture as well as as sleep mode. Overall, its an excellent TV and computer monitor at a fantastic price.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, baaad sound!
Reviews.Author: Cheap-n-Easy
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my cabin crusier. Love the picture and compactness and light weight of the TV. the remote is a little cumbersome, but the worst are the speakers. Trust me folks, this TV has a worse sound than a $5 AM radio. Speakers and volume control are abysmally bad. I only recommend if you can supplement with a stereo or external speakers.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: electro freak
Reviews.Content: The monitor part is perfect (great picture) easy to use, great size. For me dvd & tv are alittle out of focus. Some people may not notice. If you back up a bit it looks better. I'd recomend trying this tv out. Also- its "dc" 12volt so you can use it in a motor home.

Reviews.Title: Great features in small size
Reviews.Author: Jose Daza "Joandaz"
Reviews.Content: This LCD TV is a Great in features, good sound, easy menu, great image. perfect for a kitchen or small bedroom inclusive for a bathroom... it's great in there.

Reviews.Title: Great image quality
Reviews.Author: Alfredo Nieto "Ramiro Nieto"
Reviews.Content: Have a elegant design, the tv have a great quality of image its very lightweight, It's ideal for the office or rooms with little space because it's flat, work as monitor of PC in addition, the sound is acceptable, have a video and sound menu and the sleep option to TV, Bad only one is that alone it includes the power cord, the others (pc-vga, video, s-video) it is necessary to acquire them separately. Have a remote control too

ProductInfo.Features:
15-inch LCD TV and computer monitor; measures 14.6 x 12.8 x 1.9 inches (WxHxD)
Built-in 125-channel NTSC tuner
1024 x 768-pixel resolution, 250 cd/m2 brightness, 400:1 contrast ratio, 16 ms response time
Inputs: 1 composite, 1 S-Video, 1 RF, 1 PC VGA
Two stereo speakers, 2 watts apiece (4 watts total)
ProductInfo.Name: Magnavox 15MF400T 15-Inch LCD TV
